body: I think `torch._C._standard_gamma(alpha)` might work on both `Tensors` and `Variables`
body_html: I think torch._C._standard_gamma(alpha) might work on both Tensors and Variables
body_text: I think torch._C._standard_gamma(alpha) might work on both Tensors and Variables
